column3: ACK gitian builds work for me with this patch\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/219b512d726a2cf73b2abf66eafb6fd236118d0d for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK (also untested). I did quickly review the miniupnpc 1.8-1.9 diff; besides scaring the pants off me with all the memcpy/strncpy, those changes look reasonable.\n

I'm not very happy about miniupnpc either. My first hunch was to propose removing it completely. But I suppose we could lose quite some nodes if we dropped it.. (or at least, dropped upnp support, there are alternative libraries that could be used but I'm not sure they are safer)\n
